argumentText:
ARGUMENT
h i

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dpjfval.1 | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) |
| 2 |  | dpjfval.2 | |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) |
| 3 |  | dpjfval.p | |- P = ( G dProj S ) |
| 4 |  | dpjid.3 | |- ( ph -> A e. ( G DProd S ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp ( 0g ` G ) } = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp ( 0g ` G ) } |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_dpjidcl | |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. I |-> ( ( P ` x ) ` A ) ) e. { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp ( 0g ` G ) } /\ A = ( G gsum ( x e. I |-> ( ( P ` x ) ` A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> A = ( G gsum ( x e. I |-> ( ( P ` x ) ` A ) ) ) ) |
